labels.analysis: The MCP Server described is focused on running and managing machine learning models from Replicate. It provides a tool-based interface to search, browse, and execute these models, as well as manage predictions and view generated images. The available tools are specifically designed for model discovery, execution, monitoring, and display, making it a specialized platform for interacting with AI/ML models. While it has some general productivity aspects, its core functionality revolves around machine learning tasks.
labels.reasoning: The primary label, AI/ML Tools, was chosen because the server's core functionality is centered around running and managing machine learning models, which is a fundamental use case of AI/ML tools. The secondary label, Web Search & Research, was added because the "search_models" and "list_models" tools enable discovery and research of available models. No custom label is needed as the functionality is well-covered by the predefined categories.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Replicate Model Server
server_info_crawled.author: @asasvirtuais/mcp-replicate
server_info_crawled.overview: Run Replicate models through a simple tool-based interface to search, browse, and execute machine learning models. Manage predictions and view generated images seamlessly. Enhance your AI workflows by integrating Replicate's capabilities directly into your MCP client.

tools.name: search_models
tools.description: Deploy Server Replicate Model Server @asasvirtuais/mcp-replicate Try in Playground search_models

tools.name: list_models
tools.description: List available models with optional filtering

tools.name: get_collection
tools.description: Get details of a specific collection

tools.name: create_prediction
tools.description: Create a new prediction using either a model version (for community models) or model name (for official models)

tools.name: create_and_poll_prediction
tools.description: Create a new prediction and wait until it's completed. Accepts either a model version (for community models) or a model name (for official models)

tools.name: get_prediction
tools.description: Get details about a specific prediction

tools.name: get_model
tools.description: Get details of a specific model including available versions

tools.name: view_image
tools.description: Display an image in the system's default web browser

tools.name: get_image_cache_stats
tools.description: Get statistics about the image cache

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@asasvirtuais/mcp-replicate/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
